scripts.start: BRANCH=local BUCKET=local node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless invoke local -f main --path tests/resources/s3-event.json
scripts.build:copy: find src -type f \( -name "*.yml" -or -name "*.json" \) | cpio -pdm .build && find tests -type f \( -name "*.yml" -or -name "*.json" -or -name "*.base64" \)  | cpio -pdm .build
scripts.package: mkdir ${ZIP_NAME} && cp package.json package-lock.json ${ZIP_NAME}/ && cp -r .build/src/* ${ZIP_NAME}/ && cd ${ZIP_NAME} && npm ci --production && rm package.json package-lock.json && zip -qr ../${ZIP_NAME}.zip .
scripts.prepush: npm test && npm run tslint && npm run security-checks
scripts.sonar-scanner: npm run tslint && npm run coverage && sonar-scanner
scripts.package: mkdir ${ZIP_NAME} && cp package.json package-lock.json ${ZIP_NAME}/ && cp -r .build/src/* ${ZIP_NAME}/ && cd ${ZIP_NAME} && npm ci --production && rm package.json package-lock.json && zip -qr ../${ZIP_NAME}.zip .

hooks.pre-commit: npm run prepush && npm run security-checks
